<br/>

# Create-O-Holics Season 1 Modpack

[![Website][img-website]][url-website]
[![Mod list][img-mods]][file-mods]
[![Discord][img-discord]][url-discord]

The official modpack from the modded Minecraft SMP **Create-O-Holics**, based around the **Create mod** and some of its addon mods. This modpack is also used to join the public server, `coh.createoholics.com`.

</div>

## Download

[![CurseForge][img-cf]][url-cf]
[![Install with CurseForge App][img-install]][url-install]
[![Download ZIP][img-zip]][url-zip]

1. **Download CurseForge.** The CurseForge app will let you install the modpack in one click. Download the app [here](https://www.curseforge.com/download/app).
2. **Install the Create-O-Holics modpack.** Click [here](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks/create-o-holics-public-server-pack/install) to automatically install the latest version of the pack. Don’t update any mods, or your copy of the modpack will break and you will have to delete and reinstall it.
3. **Launch and get creating!** Click Play in the CurseForge app, then get started. We can’t wait to see what you do with it!

## Public server

We run a public modded Minecraft server using this modpack. With the modpack installed using the steps above, join the public server by using the below guide and enjoy!

1. **Join our Discord server.** To join the public server you’ll need to link your Discord account. Join our Discord server [here](https://discord.gg/kMNGbM87gJ).
2. **Get your link code.** Run the modpack in CurseForge. Then, in Minecraft, click Multiplayer and join the server `coh.createoholics.com`. A link command will show on screen.
3. **Run the link command and join!** In any channel in our Discord server, type in the command shown in Minecraft and select the bot from the list above the chat bar. For example, `/link 12345678`. Now you’re ready to play!

<details>
<summary><h2>Frequently asked questions</h2></summary>
<br>
<strong>Should I update the mods?</strong>
<br /><br />
No, updating individual mods will break your copy of the modpack. Please do not update any mods, and only update the entire modpack itself. If you have updated individual mods, please delete reinstall the modpack.
<br /><br />
<strong>How do I update the modpack?</strong>
<br /><br />
Navigate to the modpack’s tab on curseforge, select the versions tab, and click on the "Install" button for the latest version. Alternatively, you can right click on the modpack in the modpack list, choose "Change Version" and select the latest one.
<br /><br />
<strong>Why is my game crashing?</strong>
<br /><br />
You may need to increase the amount of RAM allocated to Minecraft. To do this on the CurseForge app, open the CurseForge settings, navigate to the "Minecraft" section, and within "Java Settings" find the "Allocated Memory" slider. Drag the slider to a higher amount of RAM allocation — we recommend setting it to 6,000 if possible.
<br /><br />
<strong>Is Forge, Bedrock, or "cracked" Minecraft clients / TLauncher supported?</strong>
<br /><br />
No, our server runs on Fabric 1.20.1 on Java Edition. You must have a paid Java Edition account to play on our server.
</details>


## Credits

Modpack created and maintained by the [Create-O-Holics team](<https://createoholics.com/roster>).

*None of the mods in this pack belong to the members of the Create-O-Holics team and are property of their respective owners. Without these amazing developers, this pack would not be possible — so thank you to all of the developers for their amazing work!*
